programme.desc: The investigation into the case of an actress who was raped on stage during a theatre production hits a dead end when the detectives learn the audience and the assailant were wearing masks during the performance. They are forced to track down the victims stalker, who filmed the crime. Starring Mariska Hargitay.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The CEO of a private military contractor is found drugged and sexually assaulted in a park, but when Benson and Amaro investigate, the victim is unwilling to cooperate. As the case progresses, they uncover a much larger crime and conspiracy in Iraq. Drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Danny Pino.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawaii
programme.desc: Kai goes under cover as a chef in a local restaurant to gather intel on a notorious criminal kingpin who has a connection to the eatery; Jane discovers that a school on the mainland has recruited Alex on a baseball scholarship.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawaii
programme.desc: NCIS agents Nick Torres and Jessica Knight travel to Hawaii when they learn a key witness in one of their old cases has turned up there with crucial evidence.

programme.title: Life of a Mountain: A Year on Scafell Pike
programme.desc: Documentary following a year in the life of Englands highest mountain, Scafell Pike, through the eyes of the farmers who work the valleys and fells, those who climb the mountain for pleasure and those who try to protect its slopes.

programme.desc: As Ian Rankin prepares to write the last `Inspector Rebus case, the award-winning author revisits the key locations from the books. In the process, Rankin explores the hidden Edinburgh into which tourists never venture.

programme.title: The Hidden Children of Ruinerwold Farm
programme.desc: The four oldest children tell their story once. The children share the memories of their father, which culminated in alleged abuse and spiritual rituals. They also visit their father in prison after an absence of ten years.

programme.title: Britains Outlaws: Highwaymen, Pirates and Rogues
programme.desc: Sam looks at urban crime, fraud and corruption in the 18th century, uncovering a fascinating rogues gallery of charmers, fraudsters and villains. Charmers like thief and serial escaper Jack Sheppard, so notorious that almost a quarter of a million people turned up to witness his hanging.

programme.title: Rip-Off Britain
programme.sub-title: Tainted Tap Water Left Us In Agony
programme.desc: Louise Minchin, Gloria Hunniford and Julia Somerville seek answers for householders who say their water company should have acted more quickly when the dangerous cryptosporidium bug was found in their tap water supply. Also on the programme, the customers of a leading double glazing firm who say theyve been left out in the cold. And the team investigate the well-known supermarket rewards points that some users say are far too easy to steal.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A back-to-front house in Eastbourne - what will Tommy make of that? Meanwhile, Dion has to tackle two derelict properties in Grimsby and Worcestershire that need far more than just a lick of paint.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp meets a teddy bear expert, who repairs everything from well-worn ears to poorly paws. Deb Hather has been mending teddies for 30 years and teaches Natasha a few tricks of the trade.

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Sara Cox and miniaturist Hannah recreate Manchesters Crumpsall Library for Leah, a retired social worker who met her late husband there as a teenager. Though the library now lies derelict, Hannahs intricate model - parquet floors, stained-glass and even Neils school cap - brings back its splendour and the love story at its heart.

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Can pyrographer Chantal finally make a full-time living from her craft, and will Claire be able to build a stained-glass business to replace her 33-year sugar-craft career?

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Ginny Buckley helps a London buyer find her dream home in the Dorset countryside and also meets a family who have turned local fish canning into a coastal success story.

programme.title: The Bidding Room

programme.desc: First to test the dealers mettle are Scott and Clare from Aberdare. But will the time and effort they put into restoring a vintage industrial trolley be reflected in the bids they receive?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It is a classic case of rookie versus veteran as rookie road tripper Bee Harford makes her debut alongside Raj Bisram in Dorset. Will she strike it lucky on her first outing, or will seasoned pro Raj take the win?

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: After the success of his comeback fight, Tommys road to redemption hits a major setback - his hand is injured again and needs eight weeks total rest before doctors will know if he can fight again. The last time he couldnt train, his life spiralled out of control, so now Tommy throws himself into a frenzy of activity: a TV appearance on The Wheel, family days out with Bambi, and a final push to finish the home he hopes Molly and Bambi will soon return to.

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The team hit Norway for a Winter Olympics special in which they attempt Olympic events, but with cars. In a world first, the team fire a rocket-powered Mini off a ski jump, Jeremy and James tackle the biathlon with the latest 4x4s, Richard stages a game of car ice hockey, and the new Jaguar XK races a speed skater.

programme.title: Dating Apps: The Inside Story
programme.desc: Documentary.

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: How a Somerset high-flyer turned his charm and connections into tools of deception - conning his school friends and hundreds of others while living a life of glamour himself.

programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: Brazils favelas are considered extremely dangerous, making them one of the worlds most deadly places to grow up. As a result of poverty and a lack of government and police control, many young men here resort to drug dealing and gang crime under the control of the drug cartels. In other neighbourhoods, heavily armed criminal militia groups control day-to-day life with an iron grip, extorting residents - fail to pay or cross them, and the consequences can be deadly.

programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: South Africa has for years battled the scourge of rhino poaching, fuelled by insatiable demand for their horns in Asia. Ashley embarks on a mission to find out who is behind these brutal acts, discovering how the challenges young men face growing up in deprived rural communities can lead to illegal poaching. Hanging out with men from KwaZulu-Natal - or Zululand - he earns their trust and joins them on a legal hunt for bushmeat in order to understand what day-to-day life is like here.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: A cautionary tale about one of the UKs most notorious credit card fraudsters, whose five-year crime wave began at just 16 years of age. While his contemporaries were using fake IDs to get into nightclubs, he was defrauding innocent cardholders from his desk in a call centre, laying the groundwork for a journey that would open up a world of wealth, first-class travel and an escape from the life he seemed destined for.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: Elliot is stealing and spending across the globe, despite a squad of investigators hot on his heels.

programme.title: Yukee

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures

She needs to come up with a plan to persuade Daisy to change her mind. So Molly organises a flash mob with everyone at the Big Hub taking part. When Daisy sees how much everyone loves her, she is sure to stay. As rehearsals for the dance begin, James goes to the vet to speak to Daisy.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion

He unwraps the presents and discovers beautiful disco roller skates, one for each of them. Weasy decides to keep them for himself and replaces them with homemade fake skates that are obviously not going to work. Will the Ducklings notice?

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, the friends form teams and play American football. Ross and Monica relive their sibling rivalry by going head-to-head as opposing team captains. Rachel is upset that Ross didnt choose her for his team, and Joey tries to outwit his foe Chandler. Meanwhile, the turkey is left stewing while the losing team calls for a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: Ross is suspicious about Rachels possible job offer from a good-looking stranger, while Chandler cant remember which of Joeys many attractive sisters he kissed at a party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross becomes increasingly jealous of Rachels sexy new colleague, Mark, and gets the wrong end of the stick when he spies on Rachel at her office. Meanwhile, Monica is enamoured with a sexy busboy who writes love poems for her, and Joey gets himself into trouble by faking his CV in order to get a part in a Broadway musical.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Monica and Richard Are Just Friends
programme.desc: Monica bumps into Richard in a video store and they decide to work on their friendship, but the more time they spend together, the more sexual their relationship becomes. Meanwhile, Phoebe dates an athlete who unintentionally keeps exposing himself by wearing loose shorts, and Rachel agrees to read `The Shining if Joey will read `Little Women.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner, Leslie, a failed television commercial jingle writer who wants to use Phoebes signature song `Smelly Cat in an advertisement for cat litter. Meanwhile, Ross becomes jealous when Rachel agrees to go to a fashion lecture with Mark, a former colleague who has just left for a new job, and Chandler meets a beautiful woman, Ginger, who has a prosthetic leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break
programme.desc: Rachels job prevents her from celebrating her anniversary with Ross. Wanting more time to focus on her new job, she suggests the two take a break from their relationship. Convinced that Rachel has dumped him for one of her workmates, Ross hooks up with a woman from the copy shop that Joey and Chandler have been after.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross tries to prevent Rachel from learning his disturbing secret. Meanwhile, Monica, Phoebe, Chandler and Joey spend a night eavesdropping.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Without the Ski Trip
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel have been fighting for the groups attention since the break up. Rachel invites everyone except Ross to her family cabin in the mountains, but on the way to the cabin, they run out of petrol. Everyone wants to call Ross for help, but Rachel wont let them.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Hypnosis Tape
programme.desc: Phoebe is upset when her 18-year-old half-brother, Frank Jr, wants to marry his attractive home economics teacher, who is more than 25 years older than him. Elsewhere, Monica receives a tip from an admirer worth a small fortune, and a hypnosis tape intended to assist Chandler give up smoking has a rather strange effect on him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Tiny T-Shirt
programme.desc: Rachels former colleague Mark asks her out on a date. When Rachel invites Ross to her apartment, he thinks she wants to get back together, but she just wants to return his things. Later, as Rachel and Mark return from their date, Ross spies on them through the peephole of Joey and Chandlers door. Meanwhile, Monica dates a millionaire, and Joey is cast in a play and clashes with the female lead.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica inherits a beautiful dollhouse that is too elaborate to play with, so Phoebe makes her own, but it meets a sad end. Meanwhile, Joey thinks hes found his true love, and Rachels boss dates Chandler, placing her in a dangerous situation.

programme.sub-title: The One With a Chick and a Duck

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Facing the devastation of losing the Forever Claim, Jared makes a desperate deal with the powerful businessman who outbid him -- but new challenges could destroy his logging season before it begins.

programme.desc: Bookbinder Chris preserves a treasured family heirloom, a Jewish prayer book. Audio expert Mark works on an old radio with a special backstory.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Upcycling authority Sarah Moore rummage through the rubbish at Woking recycling centre. Having saved three items from the skips, she calls in some crafty creatives to help her turn them into profit. While master craftsman Bruce Faulseit is faced with an antique desk, lighting designer Duncan McKean has an interesting challenge on his hands with two barley twist chairs. Sarah has some grooming sets to overhaul, but will she succeed in finding new homes for all three of her upcycled items?

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: The incredible stories of two people who are trying to track down missing relatives, including the heart-breaking story of Jacinta Hickey who wanted to find her younger brother Paul, and after 20 years of searching, Judy Kenyons hopes of finding her mother and her sister have reached a dead end, but Long Lost Family have a surprise in store for her.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Tim Medhurst is joined by first-time Road Tripper, Irita Marriott, who brings a touch of Latvian flair to the proceedings as they motor through Lincolnshire. As they get to know one another - and their bright yellow 1970s sports car.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Rookie Road Tripper Irita Marriott sets out to win, but wily Tim Medhurst hunts for rare items he knows will pique bidders interest. In any case Iritas in the pink, the Suffolk pink.

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: `Hi-de-Hi! and pantomime star Jeffrey Holland bids farewell to treasures, while broadcaster Kaye Adams makes headlines with her rare Danish furniture.

programme.title: Angus Ashworth: Yorkshire Heritage Hero
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth is heading to some of Yorkshires big country houses in a bid to help save and protect some of the countrys most incredible houses.

programme.title: Johnny Vegas Little Shop of Antiques
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Johnny Vegas embarks on a new adventure: opening an antiques shop in Lancashire. Can he turn his ramshackle dream into a business?

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Wood restorer Will attempts to bring an old fishing box back to its former glory. Meanwhile, Julie and Amanda work together to revive a badly damaged doll.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: The terrified owners of 15th-century inn The Bate Hall leave the team alone for the night to try and coax spirits to come out and play in an unnerving game of hide-and-seek.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Series in which three paranormal investigators travel the UK to help families reclaim their homes from unwelcome spirits. At Fleur De Lys, the oldest public house in the historic New Forest, the team uncover stories of a mysterious grey lady, violent spirits and experience shocking premonitions.

programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that theyre the ones being hunted.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One mans brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after its revealed hes a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: As war with the Transformers rages on, inventor Cade Yeager forms an unlikely alliance with Bumblebee, an English lord and an Oxford professor to save the planet.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Primatologist Davis Okoye shares an unshakable bond with George, an extraordinarily intelligent silverback gorilla thats been in his care since birth. When a genetic experiment goes wrong, it causes George, a wolf and a reptile to grow to a monstrous size. As the mutated beasts embark on a path of destruction, Okoye teams up with a discredited genetic engineer and the military to secure an antidote and prevent a global catastrophe.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: When the beast-themed Animilitia plague Gotham, Batman swings out to investigate. But with The Penguin and his cyber-animals added to the mix, Batman will need the help of Green Arrow and The Flash to bring them to heel.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs. Mutants
programme.desc: Gotham City faces catastrophe when Mr Freeze transforms Killer Croc and Bane into mega-sized mutant monsters. As the gigantic villains go on the rampage, its up to the caped crusader to cut them down to size.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: An ordinary chameleon, Rango, winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: Piece by Piece
programme.desc: LEGO bricks tell the life story of singer/songwriter and record producer Pharrell Williams -- from his childhood in Virginia to his success in the music and fashion industry.

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: A pair of mice, Vini and Tom, devise a plan to sneak onto Noahs Ark.

programme.title: Piece by Piece

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: A pair of mice, Vini and Tom, devise a plan to sneak onto Noahs Ark.

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: The entire town is watching with bated breath as one of their own is up for an Oscar. They get more than they bargain for when he outs his high-school English teacher, who then has to prove to everyone, especially his fiancee, that hes straight. The press turn up and one reporter in particular is making life very difficult.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker and a street hustler.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Andie Anderson writes an advice column for a fashionable magazine and agrees to demonstrate how easy it is to attract then alienate a man in just ten days. She chooses Benjamin Barry, little knowing hes an advertising executive whose job rests on proving he understands women so well that he can make one fall for him in two weeks.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Jackass 2.5
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the `Jackass crew present more idiotically irresponsible, wilfully dangerous and stomach-turningly gross stunts, taken from footage that was shot for and during the making of `Jackass 2. This time around, the action is interleaved with sections in which the cast and crew talk candidly about their role in the chaos - and how and why some of the scenes didnt turn out entirely as theyd hoped.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass 3

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: A long-smouldering flame is rekindled when a once-popular opera star reunites with her ex-husband and fellow performers at a retirement home for musicians.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: Michael Oher is a poor and undereducated African-American teenager who lived all his life on the streets. His tremendous size and quickness makes him a perfect athlete and attracts the interest if a wealthy and conservative suburban family who take him in and groom him both athletically and academically.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Parallel coming-of-age stories of a layabout `serial nice guy living a posh, carefree lifestyle off his deceased fathers fortune, and a bright but awkward youth whos tired of his mothers depressed, boyfriend-less state. Their paths collide when the boy fabricates a two-year-old son and joins a group called S.P.A.T. (Single Parents Alone Together).

programme.title: Mollys Game
programme.desc: Molly Bloom runs the worlds most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested by the FBI. Her only ally is defence lawyer Charlie Jaffey, who learns that there is much more to Molly than the tabloids lead people to believe.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Coach Ken Carter, a controversial high school basketball coach who received national attention when he benched his undefeated team due to their collective poor academic record in 1999. In the face of much criticism, Carter fought to keep his methods, determined to show the boys that they need to rely on more than sports for their futures.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Now
programme.desc: In the third of the `Look Whos Talking comedies, two dogs enter the Umbriacco household - and take an immediate dislike to each other. When Molly loses her job, husband James is forced to take on a demanding role as private airline pilot. The children miss him, so he buys a dog to cheer them up. However, when Jamess glamorous boss asks his family to look after her poodle, sparks fly between the dogs.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are sent to live with their uncle Count Olaf, but he only wants their family fortune. What follows is a battle of wits.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When a boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild as his life begins to change in unexpected ways.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When a boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild as his life begins to change in unexpected ways.

programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are sent to live with their uncle Count Olaf, but he only wants their family fortune. What follows is a battle of wits.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When a boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild as his life begins to change in unexpected ways.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When a boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild as his life begins to change in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a familys pet cat is called, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which, it is believed, can revive the dead, although in doing so they create a monster.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Fanny Brice, who rose from obscurity to become one of Americas most beloved entertainers.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, princess of the Amazons, is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: After responding to an emergency call from a mysterious woman, a young locksmith gets unwittingly caught in the crosshairs of a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy companys annual gala in a high-rise building. Its now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Mercenary Josh Hartnett is assigned a target on a flight. But when rival assassins board the plane, assassin and target are forced to team up. Gory action thriller. (2025, 98 mins)

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: Violet is a widowed mother who goes to a restaurant to meet Henry, her charming and handsome date. However, she soon receives phone messages from a mysterious, hooded figure who threatens to kill her young son and sister unless she kills Henry.

programme.desc: Exploring an abandoned visitor centre, Clover and her friends encounter a masked killer who murders them one by one. However, when they mysteriously wake up at the beginning of the same night, theyre forced to relive the terror over and over again.

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A serious TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mum. As he embraces positive holiday stories, romance blooms - but a career opportunity forces him to choose between ambition and love.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A deep space transporter crash-lands on a desolate planet circled by three suns. Among the survivors are pilot Carolyn Fry, mystic Abu `Imam al-Walid, cop William J Johns and convicted criminal Richard B Riddick, and their first thoughts are of survival and escape. Then Fry finds out that the planet suffers a total eclipse every 22 years, which is when the hibernating, flesh-eating inhabitants awake and hunt.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Outlaw Riddick, on the request of the peacemakers, lands on planet New Mecca and comes face to face with the army of Necromongers who are threatening all planets in their path. Their leader, Lord Marshal, wishes to convert all humans to his beliefs, or kill them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk

programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Heart Eyes
programme.desc: A masked maniac with glowing, red eyes returns every Valentines Day to slaughter unsuspecting couples. When a cynical ad executive and her hopelessly romantic colleague become the next target, they decide to fight back and end the reign of terror.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Surviving Christmas
programme.desc: At Christmas, rich loser Drew takes a nostalgic trip out to his old family house. Drew doesnt have anywhere to go for the holidays, so he persuades the family now living in the house to put him up - for a handsome fee, of course.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Marmee is the head of the March household in the absence of her husband, whos away fighting in the US Civil War. Her daughters range from the headstrong Jo and sweet Beth, to domesticated Meg and wilful Amy. The film follows the trials and tribulations of the girls, from early poverty and tragedy to Jos later efforts to secure both a husband and a successful writing career, and Amys relationship with an old family friend.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: An immature party girl moves in with her brothers family to get over a breakup and throws their lives out of whack.

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: Tale about a familys snowy day. Dad is a TV weatherman who tries vainly to get people to listen to his predictions, Mum is a stressed businesswoman without childcare for her toddler, and their eldest son is obsessed by the prettiest girl in the school. However, school is closed and his ten-year-old sister decides to sabotage the snowplough and extend the fun for another day.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: A troubled female cop must unravel the perfect murder as she matches wits with two homicidal schoolboys, who believe they cant be caught after committing a motiveless crime. As she gets ever closer to the truth she at once alienates her new partner and puts her own life in peril.

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Berger reacts badly when Carrie ridicules the thought of his novels New York heroine wearing a scrunchy, and Samantha and Jerry take their sexual role-playing to another level. programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Samantha must be keen on Jerry - she agrees to travel to Brooklyn to see his play, which bores her rigid until he steals the show with his trouser-dropping performance. programme.desc: The whole town gathers to take part in McCoggins treasure hunt. Whoever finds the most cogs will be the winner. programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Baby chimp Bart goes it alone, while the fearless members of the bachelor group are frightened by a new toy. programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: As Zoey the golden-cheeked gibbon goes into labour, the other gibbons seem to sense that one of their number is giving birth and so they engage in a morning singing competition. programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier Leagues greatest ever players.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier Leagues greatest ever players.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team set up for another busy day in the grounds of Hever Castle in Kent. Despite occasional downpours, thick crowds unpack their heirlooms for the experts. programme.title: Vadh
programme.desc: Dr Arjun Singh is a leading psychiatrist treating inmates at the local prison. A serial killer escapes from the prison and appears to return to the hunt. Aryan is Dr Singhs best friend, but after two of his girlfriends are killed, Dr Singhs brother Vijay suspects it is Aryan, not the escaped prisoner. Meanwhile Dr Singh is plotting vengeance against Aryan, having discovered his wife was having an affair with him.

programme.title: Love Hostel
programme.desc: The journey of a spirited young couple, being hunted by a ruthless mercenary. Will the star-crossed lovers find their fairy-tale ending?

programme.title: Phata Poster Nikhla Hero
programme.desc: Vishwas Rao was raised by his mother, who apparently dreams of him becoming a Police Inspector. However, he has different plans in mind because he wants to become a film star.

programme.title: God Tussi Great Ho
programme.desc: Arun Prajapati has been trying to be a successful TV anchor but success has always eluded him. He only blames God for this. Arun is head over heels in love with Alia, who is a TV anchor and a well-known star working in the same channel but he has never been able to express his love for her.

programme.title: Haan ... Maine Bhi Pyaar Kiya
programme.desc: Friends develop a love triangle and interpret the meaning of their relationships differently.

programme.title: Ajay
programme.desc: Ajay comes from a decent middle class family. He meets a dancer named Manorama at a club and is attracted to her, so he leaves to spend time with her in her hotel. After a few days he goes home and finds out that his whole family has been murdered.

programme.title: Ujda Chaman
programme.desc: A balding 30-year-old bachelor in search of a beautiful wife is given a deadline to find one or remain celibate forever.

programme.title: Saand Ki Aankh
programme.desc: Both over the age of 60, Chandro Tomar and Prakashi Tomar inspire other women in India when they demonstrate their expert sharpshooting skills.

programme.title: Operation Romeo
programme.desc: A young couples romantic evening transforms into a night of terror and paranoia after they cross paths with two mysterious strangers.

programme.title: Khalnayak
programme.desc: A police woman goes under cover as a belly dancer and joins an escaped convicts gang.

programme.title: Vasudha
programme.desc: Vasudha, a cheerful maid, joins business leader Chandrikas home. Despite differing beliefs, she seeks Chandrikas approval and struggles to fit into her elite world.

programme.title: Tum Se Tum Tak
programme.desc: Anu, a kind 20-year-old, and Aryavardhan, a resolute 45-year-old businessman, defy societal norms and family resistance, overcoming struggles to demonstrate that love transcends age or boundaries.

programme.title: Ganga Mai Ki Betiyaan
programme.desc: Ganga Mai is a resilient woman who is deserted by her husband for not giving birth to a son. Refusing to bow to societal expectations, she devotes herself to raising her three daughters with unwavering strength, grace, and affection.

programme.title: Saru
programme.desc: A kabaddi champion from Rajasthan moves to Mumbai, where she battles all odds, reunites with her family, and fights to get her mother her rightful place in the family while chasing her dreams.
